Add Service.description: Adds a service with version, operations, resources and errors properties

Add Resource based Service.description: Adds a service with version, resources and errors properties

Add Operation based Service.description: Adds a service with version, operations and errors properties

Add Operation.description: Adds an operation with input, output and errors properties

Add lifecycle Resource.description: Adds a resource with identifiers and lifecycle operations

Add identifier only Resource.description: Adds a resource with identifiers only

Add @input Structure shape.description: Adds a structure shape with the @input trait

Add @output Structure shape.description: Adds a structure shape with the @output trait
